name: Shikudo Leg Hit
script:
local limb = ""
if matches[2] == "left thigh" then
	limb = "left leg"
elseif matches[2] == "right thigh" then
	limb = "right leg"
else
	limb = matches[2]
end

wsys.my_limb_hit(limb, "shikudo")
matches: ^Dropping back into a low crouch, [A-Z][a-z]+ whips .+ at your (.*).$
^[\w'-]+ spins a full rotation, bringing .+ around in a blur to crash intoyour (\w+)\.$
^Whirling around, [\w'-]+ brings the ball of \w+ foot crashing into the side of your (head)\.$
